DOC.brief_summary: To assess the single- and multiple-dose pharmacokinetic (PK), safety and tolerability of AVP-786 in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Tolerability of AVP-786 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult males 18 45 years of age BMI 18 30 kg/m2 History or presence of significant disease History of substance and/or alcohol abuse within the past 3 years Use of tobaccocontaining or nicotinecontining products within 6 months Use of any prescription of overthecounter (OTC) medication within 14 days
